claim: Double jeopardy means a person cannot be tried twice for the same crime

supporting.text: Double jeopardy is a legal principle that prohibits prosecuting an individual more than once for the same offense after an acquittal or conviction.

attacks.text: Double jeopardy is a legal principle that prohibits prosecuting an individual more than once for the same offense after an acquittal or conviction.
